summary_of_the_change: The total purchase price for the Property was reduced from Four Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($475,000 USD) to Four Hundred Sixty-Five Thousand Dollars ($465,000 USD) (Sec. 2.1).
The earnest money deposit was increased from Fifteen Thousand Dollars ($15,000 USD) to Twenty Thousand Dollars ($20,000 USD) (Sec. 2.2).
The amount of the conventional mortgage loan was decreased from Three Hundred Eighty Thousand Dollars ($380,000) to Three Hundred Seventy-Two Thousand Dollars ($372,000) (Sec. 2.3).
The inspection period was extended from ten (10) days to fourteen (14) days (Sec. 3.1).
The closing date was postponed from April 30, 2024, to May 15, 2024 (Sec. 4.3).
